mapper.select: SELECT ss.shop_sku shopSku,sku.sku,ss.fnsku, case #{type} when 'ky' then sri.stock_quantity_ky when 'kp' then sri.stock_quantity_kp when 'hy' then sri.stock_quantity_hy when 'production' then sri.production_quantity else sri.stock_quantity end stockQuantity, (select GROUP_CONCAT(sl.location_no SEPARATOR ',') from shop_sku_storage_location sssl,storage_location sl where sssl.shop_sku_id=sri.shop_sku_id and sssl.storage_location_id=sl.id group by ss.shop_sku_id) locationNos from stock_record_item sri left join shop_sku ss on sri.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id left join sku on ss.sku_id=sku.sku_id where sri.stock_record_id=#{stockRecordId} and sri.stock_quantity_ky!=0 and sri.stock_quantity_kp!=0 and sri.stock_quantity_hy!=0 and sri.production_quantity!=0 and sri.stock_quantity!=0 order by ss.shop_sku
